item.title: Windows 11 Shutdown: What You Need to Know Before It's Too Late!
item.description: d. Disable automatic updates e. Disable cloud synchronization f. Transfer all data to new system Introduction Windows 11 is the latest version of the Windows operating system, released by Microsoft in October 2020. As with all new versions of Windows, there are certain features that are being discontinued and certain programs that will no longer be supported. To ensure that your data is safe and that you are prepared for the Windows 11 shutdown, it’s important to understand what will happen and how to prepare for it.
